source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>You wish for <var 29 EA02 /var> to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR_02「」の、
「レースアビリティ」を忘れさせるのかい？

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_Q1<tab>Are you certain you wish for your race chocobo to unlearn <var 28 ((ChocoboRaceAbility)) E80301 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_Q1の
「」を忘れさせますか？
※「」をひとつ消費します。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_DONE<tab>And with that, the process is complete. I pray this meets with your satisfaction.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_001_DONE……うん。
うまく「レースアビリティ」を忘れてくれたようだよ！

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR<tab>You wish for your race chocobo to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_TALK_ACTOR<tab>競走羽の「レースアビリティ」を忘れさせるのかい？

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_01<tab>No, this cannot be right, can it? According to my records, you do not even have a registered race chocobo.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_01……あれ？
競走羽登録されたチョコボがいないみたいだよ。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_02<tab>Race chocobos cannot unlearn abilities until they have been officially registered.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_001_02「レースアビリティ」を忘れさせることができるのは、
競走羽登録されたチョコボのみです。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_01<tab>You did remember to bring a bottle of lethe water, did you not? If not, I fear we cannot proceed.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_01……おや、どうやら君は、
「」を持っていないようだね。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_02<tab>Abilities cannot be unlearned without lethe water, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_002_02「レースアビリティ」を忘れさせるには、
「」が必要です。
「」は、「チョコボ用具商」から購入できます。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_01<tab>Hm. So far as I can tell, your race chocobo possesses no abilities which can be unlearned.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_01……うーん、どうやら君の競走羽には、
忘れられる「レースアビリティ」がないようだね。

source: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_02<tab>Hereditary abilities are permanent. Only acquired abilities may be unlearned.
target:
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEFORGETABILITY_00229_ERROR_003_02競走羽が忘れられるのは、「後天性アビリティ」のみです。
両親から受け継いだ、
「先天性アビリティ」を忘れることはできません。
